input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following item keywords and item name.

Item name:
Valterra D04-0054 EZ Flush Silver 20' Triple Wrap Drain Hose

Item keywords:
Maximum leak protection
40% more vinyl and wire than heavy-duty hoses
Extra heavy-duty 0.054 diameter wire can withstand more abuse from accidental crushing
30 coils per foot creates the smoothest interior for complete waste removal
Use for full-time and semi-permanent RVing

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Introducing the iCandy Combat Thermal Execution Targets Shooter Targets for Shooting Range Targets - the perfect addition to your shooting range! Made in the USA, these thick paper targets feature the iconic iCandy Combat design and are perfect for target practice. With a size of 13x19 inches, these targets are large enough to see from a distance and provide clear visibility. The thermal targets make it easy to see your marksmanship, even in low-light conditions. So why wait? Add the iCandy Combat Thermal Execution Targets to your shooting range today!
input_text.Response B: The Valterra D04-0054 EZ Flush Silver 20' Triple Wrap Drain Hose is a great solution for full-time and semi-permanent RVing. It features a 40% more vinyl and wire than heavy-duty hoses. The extra heavy-duty 0.054 diameter wire can withstand more abuse from accidental crushing. The 30 coils per foot creates the smoothest interior for complete waste removal. This drain hose is designed to provide maximum leak protection. It is easy to install and use. It is a universal hose that fits most waste connections.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.

label_annotations.feedback: Response A is about a different product
